summary: Molly is a girl living in the year 1944 and WWII has brought many changes to Molly's life. An English girl comes to live with Molly's family to escape the bombings. They slowly become good friends.
cast: Maya Ritter|David Aaron Baker|Tory Green|Sarah Manninen|Genevieve Farrell|Andrew Chalmers|Molly Ringwald|Hannah Fleming|Samantha Somer Wilson|Josette Halpert|Sarah Orenstein|Eliza Jane Scott|Amy Stewart|Mary Francis Moore|Elva Mai Hoover|Geri Hall|Bradley Reid|Joe Sacco|Keith Knight|Landon Norris|Dana Gould|Luke Muirhead|Steve Carey|Cameron Lewis|Jason Spevack|Alexa Rose Steele|Sean Wayne Doyle|Hanna Cowie|Amanda Finelli|Roxanne Hummel|Stephanie Troyak|Morgan Mitchell|Jordana Mirsky|Chelsea Stowe|Natasha Crombie|Jerri-Lynne Smith|Thomas Brodie-Sangster|Linda Darnell|Kaleigh Howland|Bill Timoney|Audrey Twitchell|Karen Musey
title: Molly, el triunfo de una niña
